SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: OVERDUE_WOS
SQLDataSource.Where: WO_NO IN (select wo_no FROM (SELECT wt.wo_no, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_State(wt.wo_no) state, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(wt.task_seq) AS contract_id, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(wt.wo_no) reg_date, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(wt.task_seq)) representative_id FROM &AO.jt_task_cfv wt WHERE &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Contract_Id(wt.wo_no)) = 'MS' AND state IN ('New', 'Prepared', 'Released', 'Work Started', 'Under Preparation') AND cf$_tunstall_sla < SYSDATE) WHERE REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(representative_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
